generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Minecraft Use Modifiers Misc
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: This component modifies use effects, including how long the item takes to use and the player's speed when used in combination with components like "shooter", "throwable", or "food".

fields.title: Movement Modifier
fields.description: Modifier value to scale the players movement speed when item is in use.

fields.title: Use Duration
fields.description: How long the item takes to use in seconds.
